name: radio
description: Radio Service to for braodcast and web radio functionalitys. For NAR market a sdars service will extent the radio functionality

audiosegments.description:
This endpoint contains audiosegments for playblack.
WebRadio Episodes will be part of audiosegements.
SDARS: a sportsFlash, TWN Report is a audio segement

airTime.description:
UTC timestamp of the actual air time

is JSON undefine if the information is unavailable

contextualInfo.description: contextual text for the content (trending, new, etc…)

duration.description:
song duration, 
property is undefine if a station has an unlimited audioSegement

is JSON undefine if the information is unavailable

gameEvent.description: reference to game event object if current content is a sports event.

isBuffered.description:
indicate if a audioSegement is bufferd and has and defined limit. [SDARS ONLY]

is JSON undefine if the information is unavailable

lastListened.description: UTC timestamp when the content was last listened to

showName.description:
provides the shown name for the Song/episode 

JSON undefine if the information can't supported

songAlbum.description: album name of the song contained in this audiosegment

songCategory.description:
song category/genre string array

is JSON undefine if the information is unavailable

songDate.description:
song release date

is JSON undefine if the information is unavailable

songTitle.description: title of the song contained in this audiosegment

sportsEventDetails.description:
Provide the SXM sport game details such as Quarter or Inning

JSON undefine if not supported/available

sportsEventName.description: name of the broadcasted sports event

sportsTeamHome.description: reference to the home sports team that is broadcasted

sportsTeamScoreHome.description:
SXM home team score

JSON undefine if not supported/available

sportsTeamScoreVisitor.description:
SXM visitor team score

JSON undefine if not supported/available

sportsTeamVisitor.description:
SXM reference to the visitor sports team that is broadcasted
JSON undefine if not supported/available

station.description: the station that created this segment (set to JSON-undefined if not applicable)

sxmArtistFavorite.description: Reference to a favoriteArtistTitleObject, if the currently playing artist is an SXM favorite.  Undefined if the currently playing artist is not an SXM favorite, or if not relevant for the current active source (for example, FM)

sxmTitleFavorite.description: Reference to a favoriteArtistTitleObject, if the currently playing title is an SXM favorite.  Undefined if the currently playing artist is not an SXM favorite, or if not relevant for the current active source  (for example, FM)

parameters.description: The server shall support filtering of GET requests for all combinations of properties listed in the following plus id, name, uri.

bands.description: Radio bands host typical bands in car radios and virtual bands that combine bands e.g. USL.  This resource provides available bands.

alternativeFrequency.description: follow alternative frequencies for stations on this band. Set to JSON-undefined if 'AF' feature is technically not possible on this band.

ibocFunction.description:
switch iboc on/off for HD Radio and DRM.

is JSON undefine for irrelevant bands.

otherAnnouncements.description:
Switch to control the other announcements available in DAB band only. 
DAB announcement contains the following DAB announcement types: 
Alarm (if not treated as own category), Warning, News, Weather, Event, Special event, Program Info, Sport report, Financial Report. 
Set the property value to ‘True’ to turn other announcements ON  (Default) and ‘False’ to turn OFF. Set the property value to JSON-undefined in band elements for which this property is irrelevant.

phonetics.description: Array of references to phonetic data for voice control (SDS) of this band.

radioDataSystem.description: "switch RDS on/off in FM band. Set the property value to ‘True’ to turn Radio Data System ON and ‘False’ to turn OFF . Set the property value to JSON-undefined in band elements for which this property is irrelevant.

ranges.description: list of continous HF ranges belonging to this band. Number of array members depends on geographical region.

regionsModeSelection.description: switch that allows the selection of a region depending upon the  car position or manual selection by the user. Default (Automatic). This property is helpful to load station logos from database and the bands that provide station logos", change the property value as per the user selection in all relevant bands and JSON-undefined for bands for which do not provide any station logos.

serviceLinking.description: defines the allowed linking possibilities within and between radio bands

trafficProgramme.description: A band may contain stations or programmes broadcasting traffic information. 'true': reception of traffic programmes is ON, 'false' - reception of traffic programmes is OFF. Set to JSON-undefined if traffic programmes are not broadcast on this band.

virtualBandFlag.description: a flag that indicate that the band is a mix of multiple physical bands

parameters.description: The server shall support filtering of GET requests for all combinations of properties listed in the following plus id, name, uri.

categories.description: This endpoint provides categories. They may be donwloaded/defined during runtime (in case of SDARS) or be defined at design time (e.g. in case of DAB, RDS, RDBS).

name.description: shall be set to the shortest available name of a category

bands.description: reference to bands element to support band specific categories

categoryBackgroundImageLandscape.description: SXM category background image in landscape format

categoryBackgroundImagePortrait.description: SXM category image in portait format

categoryType.description:
@Deprecated: No longer used
type of category

imageOverDark.description:
image of the category over dark background if avaialble otherwise JSON Undefine

URI to CDN service

imageOverLight.description:
image of the category over light background, if avaialble otherwise JSON Undefine

URI to CDN service

subCategories.description: Member categorys of a major category.

superCategory.description: Flag indicating that this category is a supercategory

collections.description: radio collections host playable items such as audio segments or stations. collections can be used to represent certain features as well, like SXM tuneMixes, sportsFlash, trafficWheatherNow, title and artist seeks or tuneScans. The previous/next functionality is expressed by the length of the items property. If the player, using the collection, points to an item in the items list that has:  a) a left neighbor, `previous` action is possible to be fullfilled by moving the pointer to the neighbor b) a right neighbor, `next` action is possible to be fullfilled by moving the pointer to the neighbor. The existence of a collection with a certain name expresses a features availability (e.g. a SXMTuneScan collection exists, so the featur SXM tuneScan is generally available.).

filterChannelNumber.description: filter the elements of the collection to an SDARS channelNumber

filterFrequency.description: a frequency that user want to tune to

filterProgram.description: A reference to a station or viritual station(TuneMix Object)

playableItems.description: collection of playable items. If a station don't support separated items, just one item shall created for.

listiterators.description: Iterator that provides the next, previous items of the referenced list and also parameter to set loopAround

loopAround.description:
a switch that allowed to loop the list.
True = loop allowed
false = loop is not allowed

nextItem.description: next element in the list related to current item, empty , if the element does not exist

prevItem.description:
prev element in the list related to current item,
empty , if the element does not exist

referenceList.description: the refence of list that is running through e.g. StationList, PresetList, Collection, ...

players.description: the replay manager of streaming radio content

autoStore.description: This property specifies the status of the autoStore function. Set the value to ‘true’ when autoStore is triggered and being executed; ‘false’ otherwise. Default status is false.

band.description: current band, usuallay as set by the user

isLiveContent.description: Wheather current content is at the live point or not

offset.description: current play position in/on currentItem; set to JSON-undefined if content is not buffered

playFromStart.description: Controls for all smart favorite stations if every title shall be be played from its start. This setting affects stream buffering inside the sxm module.

restartSegement.description: property used to start the current playing segment from the beginning.  Unavailable = restart is not possible for the current segment.  Available = restart is possible for the current segment and the possibility should be presented to the user.  Startover = user input to restart the current segment from the beginning

scanActive.description:
indication if the client scan is activated
True = scanIsActive

Default = FALSE. 
JSON Undefine if the current active source does not support scan functions.

seamlessLinkToOnline.description: indicate if a seamless link to Online is avaialble

state.description: playback state, if a 'not buffered' station is tuned, then state is undefined.

streamingServer.description: Contains the URI of an (internet) streaming service (audio signal).

sxmSportsNotification.description: if SXM SportsFlash is not applicable the property is undefine. The notification will be given as an new object in sdars/sportsEvents

temporaryLinkedBand.description: temporary link to a band object to reflect a (temporary) band change due to quality reasons, e.g. link from DAB to FM. This indication might be used to indicate changes in the audio quality to be expected.

trafficProgramStatus.description:
indicate about the TP availability for active source. 
JSON Undefine if TP does support.

tuneScan.description: to controll the SXM tune Scan feature

parameters.description: The server shall support POST on element level for the following properties.

band.description: POST on this property to set the tuner to another frequency band.

collection.description: POST on occlection to set the player to another collection.

currentItem.description: POST on currentItem to set the player to another audiosegment within the collection being played. E.g. this can be used to implement functionality like 'next' or 'previous'.

presets.description: A radio station preset allows to quickly access favorite stations. This endpoint provides access to the systems presets.

position.description: preset position in the list, according to the PSO parameters

station.description: radio station or a SDARS TuneMix object (NAR only)

parameters.description: Use DELETE to pure a station from a preset or to delete a preset completely.
The server shall support filtering of GET requests for all combinations of properties listed in the following plus id, name, uri.

ranges.description: This endpoint provides continous HF ranges supported by the tuner. These ranges belong to different bands. The linking between bands and HF ranges is defined in resource /radio/bands. Please note, a band may consist of several ranges, e.g. fragmented DAB band

settings.description: setting parameters for the radio service

isFactoryDefault.description:
Set true if radio and SDARS settings are factory default. Set to false is settings have been changed by the user or any other service.
If a client post sets this back to true, a factory reset shall be performed.

stationLists.description: A station list for main display group

bands.description:
array of bands objects to configure/filter the mainStation list

property can not adapted by indepanded stationList objects

size.description: maximal number of stations in the list

stationListFilter.description:
-deprecated: Filter split of into Bands, sxmStationSubscription 
- configure the station list content via combination of properties 
string to generate a station list regarding element types and sorting

sxmStationSubscription.description:
filter option for sxm channels.
combinations of enums possible
Property is JSON undefine for irrelevant bands

stations.description: This endpoint provides available stations, regardless of the physical source.

name.description: name of station (RDS PS, Podcast,DAB,SDARS short channel name with 8 chars).

audioStatus.description:
Information about digital decoding state of an IBOC station and digital based station. Property is defined, if this station is IBOC or web radio capabale. BallgameMode is HD Radio programs only
online = stream over IP

bufferProgress.description:
current buffering progress is limited by maxBufferTime

The property is undefine for non buffering content.

category.description: The category/pty of a station or genres of podcast, defined by database or SDARS operator (sxm).

channelNumber.description:
channel number in case of SDARS reception
The Property undefine by no SDARS channel

channelSubscription.description:
provide the subscription status of a SXM channel

Free to air (FTA) = available, subscription plan independence
subscribed = available, part of the subscription plan

unsubscribed = available, not part of the subscription plan

unavailable = not part of the channel line up
upgrade = content is available through a different subscription package than the user’s current subscription

contextualInfo.description: contextual text for the content (trending, new, etc…)

country.description: country name of the station (128 Chars)

ecc.description:
extended country code; is unique along with the 4 MSB of pi

Property is JSON undefined if not valid for an element

fixPS.description:
Flag that is set to 'true' if the name of station is frozen.

The Default for fixPS is FALSE. 
Property is JSON undefined if not valid for an element

freqLabel.description: the frequency label of the best frequency (see property 'freq'), is supported only for stations broadcast on DAB or DMB

frequency.description: frequency, is the best AF (if AF is enabled); AF:..alternaive frequency

geoRestricted.description:
indicator that the current playing content for this station cannot be heard due to georestriction.
Property will be unbefine if no restriction is available.

_ restrictedLocation: content cannot be stream in the current location ; _ undeterminedLocation: current vehicle location cannot be verified

images.description:
image slide show the newest will be added to the first element.
limited to 20 slides

URI to CDN service

isLocked.description:
flag that inicate if a channel is locked / Filtered out, to use e.g. for Parental Lock
true= Locked
false=unlocked
default = false
JSON Undefine if not valid for an element

isSmartFavorite.description:
Is `undefined` if the feature (SXMSmartFavorite) is not applicable for the station. `True` expresses that a station is marked as a smartFavorite.
default = false
JSON Undefine if not valid for an element

isTrafficProgramme.description:
indicates if station is a TP station
isn't TP = FALSE
is TP = TRUE
default = false
JSON Undefine if not valid for an element

language.description: The language the programme is broadcast in. Set to JSON-undefined if language is unknown.

lastListend.description: a UTC time stamp that allowed to get the last tuned station

logoOverDark.description:
stationLogo over dark background, SAT Radio only
if not available, property is JSON undefine

URI to CDN service

logoOverLight.description:
stationLogo over light background, SAT Radio only

if not available, property is JSON undefine

URI to CDN service

logoRecommendationPreferred.description:
a station logo that will recommended by the service or define by the client (UserDefined Logo)

URI to CDN service

logos.description:
station logo images, the first element is used as preview logo

URI to CDN service

maxBufferTime.description: provide the maximum buffer capacity time of the staton/stream

mixable.description: Set to 'true' if station can be added to SXM (SDARS) tuneMixes collection. Set to JSON-undefined in case of a non SDARS station.

nameLong.description: long name of station (SDARS,DAB,FM 56chars) and podcast

nameMedium.description: medium long name of station (SDARS  and Podcast,  10chars)

onlineLinkingStatus.description:
Indicator of availability of another audio stream for this content
supported = content has alternate stream available
unsupported = content does not have alternate stream available
linkingInQuery = service requesting stream change
linkingAccepted = client has accepted stream change

phonetics.description: Array of references to phonetic data for voice control (SDS) of this station.

podcast.description: The flag identify a station as a podcast. For none web radio based station property is undefine.

programType.description:
description of the current playing program

is undefine if not supported. is empty string if supported and not information available.

programmeDescriptionLong.description: Contains a programme description with up to 2048 chars, supported for SDARS, IBOC station long name and service display name. Also to use for description of episode.

programmeDescriptionShort.description: Contains a programme description with up to 36chars, at the moment supported for SDARS only.

providerLogo.description:
provide the content provider image e.g. WebRadio

URI to CDN service

qualityType.description:
Quality type of (internet) streams
>= 192kb/s == High
>=128 kb/s == medium
<128 kb/s == low

radiotext.description: Radio text of the current tuned station.

receptionQuality.description: defines reception quality of this station

region.description: region of the station (128 chars) I18N localized text

regionalProgrammeCode.description: Station is a regional station. If the station is regionalized, the value is providing the regional code. If the station is currently not regionalized, the value is empty. If a band is not supporting regional, the Property is undefined.

relatedAudiosegments.description: array of audiosegment of the station e.g. to represent episodes of a podcast station

relatedShows.description: array of shows with similar content

serviceId.description:
service id for IBOC

The number of the sub station e.g. HD2, HD3 

If non HD station property is JSON Undefine

stationBackground.description:
provide the station related background image

URI to CDN service

stationRanking.description:
a integater value to provide the ranking of a station 

e.g. for WEB Radio Top100

streamingServer.description: Contains the URI of the best (internet) streaming server (URI to audio signal source).

substations.description: sub station of digital radio station (DAB or IBOC).Or Station family in Web Radio.

virtualStation.description:
deprecated: property will not longer used

a station there the user cannot tune to can be reference to an other object or present other information.

parameters.description: The server shall support filtering of GET requests for all combinations of properties listed in the following plus id, name, uri.
